channel.title: Voice Technology on FinanClub

item.title: SOUN
item.description: score:177 Chances: SoundHound AI has reported substantial year-over-year gains with a record quarter, indicating a positive trajectory for the company’s financial performance. The company’s in-vehicle voice assistant using a large language model completely on the edge while running on the NVIDIA DRIVE platform is an innovative and promising development.
